Class PlayMusic

  • java.lang.Object
    • PlayMusic

  • public class PlayMusic
extends java.lang.Object
    Prompt the user for the song they want to play and plays it, displaying artwork too.
    Version:
    0.2.0
    Author:
    Zachary Ferguson

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

        Parameters:

      • buildSonglist

        private static java.util.ArrayList<SongDetails> buildSonglist(java.lang.String filename)
                                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Constructs a list of SongDetails from the File with the given name.
        Parameters:
        filename - Name of the songlist file containing the song titles and filenames.
        Returns:
        Returns a new ArrayList of SongDetails aquired from the File.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Throws an exception if something goes wrong while reading the songlist file.

      • buildSonglist2

        private static java.util.ArrayList<SongDetails> buildSonglist2(java.lang.String filename)
                                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Constructs a list of SongDetails from the File with the given name.
        Parameters:
        filename - Name of the songlist file containing the song titles and filenames.
        Returns:
        Returns a new ArrayList of SongDetails aquired from the File.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Throws an exception if something goes wrong while reading the songlist file.

      • getPlaylist

        private static java.util.Scanner getPlaylist(int songCount)
        Gets a Scanner to get the playlist from. The playlist is a list of songs to play by number.
        Parameters:
        songCount - The number of songs available. Used to make a playlist of all song and to make a shuffled playlist.
        Returns:
        Returns a Scanner that scans over the playlist selected.

      • makeAllPlaylist

        private static java.util.Scanner makeAllPlaylist(int songCount)
        Makes a playlist containing all available songs in order
        Parameters:
        songCount - The total number of songs available including "0", exit.
        Returns:
        Returns a Scanner that scans over all available songs.

      • getStringPlaylist

        private static java.util.Scanner getStringPlaylist()
        Makes a playlist from the users input string
        Returns:
        Returns a Scanner that scans over all the song in the users input.

      • savePlaylist

        private static void savePlaylist(java.lang.String playlist)
        Saves the given String playlist to a file.
        Parameters:
        playlist - String playlist to write out to file.

      • getFilePlaylist

        private static java.util.Scanner getFilePlaylist()
        Makes a playlist from the selected file containing a playlist
        Returns:
        Returns a Scanner that scans over all the songs specified in the file.

      • makeShufflePlaylist

        private static java.util.Scanner makeShufflePlaylist(int songCount)
        Makes a playlist containing a random number, r, of songs in random order. Where r is greater than 5 and less than 100.
        Parameters:
        songCount - The total number of songs available including "0", exit.
        Returns:
        Returns a Scanner that scans over at least 5 songs in random order.

      • getSongChoice

        private static SongDetails getSongChoice(java.util.Scanner playlist,
                                         java.util.ArrayList<SongDetails> songinfos)
        Gets the users choice of song form the Scanner in input.
        Parameters:
        playlist - Scanner to get the input for the song to be chosen.
        songinfos - ArrayList of Song Details to be used for displaying the song options by title and for getting the filename of the choice to return.
        Returns:
        String of file name with out .extension.

      • saveSonglist

        private static void saveSonglist(java.lang.String filename,
                                 java.util.ArrayList<SongDetails> songlist)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a songlist file with the, with the given name, containing the contents of the given ArrayList of SongDetails
        Parameters:
        filename - A String for the name of the file to save the songlist to.
        songlist - An ArrayList of SongDetails that will be printed out to the created file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Throws an IOException if the file is unable to open for writing.

      • sortSonglist

        private static java.util.ArrayList<SongDetails> sortSonglist(java.util.ArrayList<SongDetails> songlist)
        Sorts the given ArrayList of SongDetails in the order specified by the SongDetails' compareTo(). New list will be return, and the original list will remain unchanged. Uses a QuickSort algorithm to sort the list.
        Parameters:
        songlist - The ArrayList of SongDetails to be sorted. Will remain unchanged.
        Returns:
        Returns a copy of the given ArrayList that is sorted and independent of the original.
